attributes.action: A list of doctors who will not strike on the 21st of June.
attributes.additional_details:
The majority of doctors did not vote to strike over pensions.

We undersigned do not support the strike, and are prepared to work as normal on the 21st of June.

This does not mean that we support the government's approach to our pension.

There are many pressing concerns facing our profession. This strike distracts attention from the most important ones
